content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans. I understand that I'm in READ-ONLY mode and can only explore files and plan solutions - I cannot create, modify, or delete any files.

Let me start by getting familiar with the project structure:

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent && find . -type f -name "*.md" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent && ls -la</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent && cat README.md 2>/dev/null || echo "No README found"</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

I'm warmed up and ready! I can see this is a personal agent project with:
- A Go backend (`packages/go-backend/`)
- A desktop UI (`packages/desktop/`)
- Multiple inference providers (OpenAI, and what looks like a new Gemini provider being added)

The recent commits show you've been:
- Restoring core skills
- Increasing UI information density
- Removing Python remnants
- Adding new providers with a unified interface
- Improving backend provider management

I'm ready to receive your requirements and explore the codebase to design implementation plans. What would you like me to help plan?
